overview_summary: None of these five neighboring landowners has a documented stance, with all classified as having an unknown position on new development. Similarly, none hold formal local offices or leadership roles; all appear to have low individual influence in the community. No high-influence neighbors were identified among the group.

neighbors.name: Rodrick B. Sauls
neighbors.claims: Public records indicate that Rodrick B. Sauls owns property in Anderson County ([andersonrecords.org](https://andersonrecords.org/property-records#:~:text=Anderson%20County%20property%20records%20constitute,with%20South%20Carolina%20state%20law)). No official or media sources could be found showing Sauls in any community or political role ([www.wyff4.com](https://www.wyff4.com/article/90-year-old-missing-anderson-county/65189449#:~:text=County,Anyone%20with%20information)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have an agricultural extension agent or respected local farmer reach out, emphasizing respect for farmland use and offering to discuss how the project can coexist with traditional land uses.

neighbors.name: Michael S. Gossett & Kelli S. Whitman
neighbors.claims: Kelli S. Whitman is associated with a mailing address in Starr, South Carolina ([www.idcrawl.com](https://www.idcrawl.com/kelli-whitman#:~:text=Kelli%20S%20Whitman%20PO%20Box,%2A%2A%2A%2A%2A%20Sunrise%20Lake%20Ct)). Neither Whitman nor Michael S. Gossett appears in local civic records or news reports on development issues ([thejournalonline.com](https://thejournalonline.com/2012/12/26/county-government-business-and-politics-year-in-review-2012/#:~:text=The%202012%20Anderson%20County%20Council,for%20lack%20of%20a%20second)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the couple through a neighbor they know or a farm community contact, focusing on how land value and agricultural heritage will be maintained or protected by the project.

neighbors.name: Donald B. Wilson & Sue G. Wilson
neighbors.claims: Public information reveals no community leadership roles for Donald B. or Sue G. Wilson; local reporting on a prominent Wilson refers to an unrelated former official ([thejournalonline.com](https://thejournalonline.com/2012/12/26/county-government-business-and-politics-year-in-review-2012/#:~:text=former%20County%20Councilman%20and%20Easley,businessman%20Ron%20Wilson)). The Wilsons are private landowners with no record of public statements on development proposals ([thejournalonline.com](https://thejournalonline.com/2012/12/26/county-government-business-and-politics-year-in-review-2012/#:~:text=former%20County%20Councilman%20and%20Easley,businessman%20Ron%20Wilson)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a one-on-one conversation via a familiar community member or neighbor, addressing any concerns about preserving the quiet and privacy of their property during and after construction.

neighbors.name: Lynn B. Hill
neighbors.claims: Lynn B. Hill has no detectable public presence; the surname only appears in historical records (e.g., a 1905 Hill family grave) ([genealogytrails.com](https://genealogytrails.com/scar/anderson/siloambaptist_cem.htm#:~:text=Hill%2C%20George%20Lewis%2C%201851%2C%20D,1880)). No evidence of Hill’s involvement in local civic affairs or opinions on development was found ([genealogytrails.com](https://genealogytrails.com/scar/anderson/siloambaptist_cem.htm#:~:text=Hill%2C%20George%20Lewis%2C%201851%2C%20D,1880)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach carefully via personal introduction (perhaps through a mutual acquaintance) to build trust. Listen for any unspoken concerns, as Hill has not voiced opinions publicly.

neighbors.name: Eric Schaefer & Christine Demetriou
neighbors.claims: Christine Demetriou works as an Office Manager at E.W. Schaefer Contracting, Inc., a role she has held since 2009 ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/christine-demetriou%27s-email/137350655#:~:text=Office%20Manager%20at%20E,Contracting%2C%20Inc)). Her professional profile places her in Woodruff, SC (outside Anderson County), suggesting they do not reside on their Anderson property ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/christine-demetriou%27s-email/137350655#:~:text=Woodruff%2C%20South%20Carolina%2C%20United%20States)). Neither Demetriou nor Eric Schaefer has made any public comments on local development known to date ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/christine-demetriou%27s-email/137350655#:~:text=Woodruff%2C%20South%20Carolina%2C%20United%20States)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage them with data and third-party assurances about property values and future resale potential. Having a local economic development official or real estate professional join the discussion could address their likely concerns.
